channel.title: California
channel.description: California news and features from the Los Angeles Times.

item.title: Jury awards over $460 million to 2 ex-Edison employees in lawsuit over sexual harassment and retaliation
item.dc:creator: Richard Winton
item.description: The two men alleged they were forced out of their jobs at Southern California Edison after reporting repeated sexual and racial harassment at a South Bay office.
item.content:encoded: The two men alleged they were forced out of their jobs at Southern California Edison after reporting repeated sexual and racial harassment at a South Bay office.

media:content.media:description: MONTEREY PARK, CALIF. -- TUESDAY, OCTOBER 23, 2018: A view of park benches near the power lines at Monterey Park's Edison Trails in Monterey Park, Calif., on Oct. 23, 2018. (Allen J. Schaben / Los Angeles Times)l

item.title: Bank robbery suspect dead after chase and shootout with authorities in San Bernardino
item.dc:creator: Gregory Yee
item.description: A bank robbery suspect who led authorities on a chase was killed in a shooting with San Bernardino County sheriff's deputies and Colton police officers, authorities confirmed.
item.content:encoded: A bank robbery suspect who led authorities on a chase was killed in a shooting with San Bernardino County sheriff's deputies and Colton police officers, authorities confirmed.

media:content.media:description: Authorities were at the scene of a fatal shooting in San Bernardino that followed a crash after a bank robbery suspect led law enforcement personnel on a chase Thursday. Officials confirmed San Bernardino County sheriff's deputies and Colton police officers fatally shot the suspect after the suspect open fired on them with a rifle.
